forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers this morning. Becoming sunny later. High -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers this morning. Becoming sunny later. High around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds. Low -13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 9F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 27F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low near -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 23F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow showers during the morning. Then partly to mostly cloudy for the afternoon. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few snow showers scattered about the area in the morning, otherwise a good deal of clouds. High 37F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 38F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low around 35F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow early changing to all rain and becoming intermittent late. High 3C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low near 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 33F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Temps nearly steady in the low to mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 28F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
